6. API documentation¶

This section presents the different modules that constitute the toolkit Boing. The documentation of the classes and functions of the toolkit’s API is hereinafter provided.

The Boing toolkit is structured into the following modules:

  • 6.1. boing — Creating and managing pipelines
  • 6.2. boing.core — The pipeline infrastructure
  • 6.3. boing.filtering - Filters and noise generators
  • 6.4. boing.gesture — Gesture recognition tools
    • 6.4.1. boing.gesture.rubine — The Rubine’s recognition algorithm
    • 6.4.2. boing.gesture.utils — Recognizers’ common utilities
  • 6.5. boing.net — Networking and encoding tools
    • 6.5.1. boing.net.bytes — UNICODE encoding
    • 6.5.2. boing.net.slip — SLIP encoding
    • 6.5.3. boing.net.json — JSON encoding
    • 6.5.4. boing.net.osc — OSC encoding
    • 6.5.5. boing.net.pickle — Python pickle encoding
    • 6.5.6. boing.net.ip — IP utilities
    • 6.5.7. boing.net.tcp — TCP utilities
    • 6.5.8. boing.net.udp — UDP utilities
    • 6.5.9. boing.net.ntp — NTP utilities
  • 6.6. boing.nodes — The nodes of the pipeline
  • 6.7. boing.utils — Common utilities
    • 6.7.1. boing.utils.url — Uniform Resource Locator
